content.detailedDescription:
It was a very clear evening,no clouds,or wind at all.
visibility about 20 miles.
my window faces south ,south east.
no aircraft were visible or heard,as i remarked to family how peacefull the evening was.
the moon was up and clear and i decided to take a couple of shots on my digital camera from my upstairs window.
the camera is a minolta dimage g400 with 4 megapixal,and optical zoom.

nothing untoward was visible in the sky.

on downloading the photos to my pc , i noticed a violet and red coloured object at near top of picture.
in windows i zoomed in on the object to see it has three lights which appear to be inside it,the object being allmost see through,
there also seems to be several structures within but the zoom loses its clarity to such an extent that these can only be seen as blurs.
the object on inspection appears red on top,red underneath,violet in the middle with slight yellow toward the underneath rear.
the object appears to be surrounded by a plasma or gaseous bubble which trails behind it.


i transferred a copy of the photograph to windows paint,where i inverted the colours.
this image on zooming in shows the object has a peculiar trail intimating its decent and high speed.
i deduced the "high speed"as the object was not visible in the three other photos,and was not visible in real time as i looked toward the sky.
i also have noted on the previous and post photographs that there are no stars visible in that area.
the object also shows the three internal lights as black dots which i would assume confirms there presence.
my neighbours house becomes visible in this format.

copy the photograph to windows picture viewer and zoom in ,also then look at it in inverted colour mode.
content.summary: Photographing nice moon item showed later on inspection

content.detailedDescription: I was at work just at sundown sitting in my jeep. i looked out over the near by mountain, mt. solo, because i could see a storm system moving in from the west. i was on my cell phone talking to my fiancee at the time. hovering over the mountain was a bright orange fireball. it did not move for three to four minutes. i had to look away for a second to check something, i work in security and have certin responsibilities, and when i turned back it was gone. a few days later i was looking at a photo posted to coast to coast am's website of the same type of object over mt. adams on the same night. when i first saw the object i passed it off as a play of the setting sun on the incoming storm, but, after seeing the photo, and that the photo was taken on the same night, i knew that it was not something normal.
content.summary: Fireball over mountain

content.detailedDescription:
We were vacationing in kingsburg, ns, canada at a a very remote cottage ( 44���17'6.32"n,  64���14'33.67"w)  overlooking the atlantic. we had many friends over watching the night sky looking s. the ocean horizon was barely visible (we estimate 25miles out) when a very bright orange sphere apeared above the horizon. we debated as to whether it was a distant traulers main floods,or something else. i do have a canon rebel digital slr eos with 300mm lens attached. shooting multiple long exposures (4-5sec) at iso 1600 onto raw format i captured the object multiple times stationary aver ~ 20 mins. object can be seen in front of distant clouds on the horizon. no boat/traulers show on the exposures, however above clouds do seem to reflect glow somewhat. focus was set manually . first shots were jittery due to handheld shots, however later shots were propped on a solid surface.

object eventually dimmed to nothing, and later came back again. then again dimmed.

i did not get the impression that this was one of the large vessels from lunenburg at all. next night we saw a large fishing boat with normal runnning lights on - clearly showing a boat outline. in fact the lights from other vessels (rare at that time of night) are incredibly dim from our vantage. fog not at factor either.

this large light was intense and powerful orange.
content.summary: Solitary bright orange object hovering over atlantic

content.detailedDescription: I had gone out shortly after a storm to photograph a beautiful rainbow. it was about 7:43 pm on august 21, 2008. it was very overcast so i came home after shooting 40 frames.After i shot the 40 frame series of photographs and while looking through them later i noticed an object in the sky in one of my shots. i am attaching the original photograph and a tightly cropped image of what i saw in the picture. also i am including an original photo shot from the exact location of the one in which the object showed up. i am not sure of what it is but it looks like a ufo to me. this article and the photographs have full copyright protection.
content.summary: Object noted in review of photographs taken

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on my deck in hermosa beach and something in the sky caught my eye.  i was sitting in a chair facing west and this object was south - over the town of redondo beach, which is the next town over from me and starts a few blocks away from me. it was circular shaped like a frisbee and had the brightest white lights around the outer edge and it also had a few red lights as well. it was hovering over the same area in the sky (for as long as i saw it, which was about 20-25 minutes). there was a marine layer or fog, and it was flying directly below that. it was much lower than any commercial airline flies. even though multiple times, it went up a little higher and part of it was lost in the fog, i was still always able to see at least the other part of it that was not in the fog - part of it, if not all of it, was visible during the 20-25 minutes that i was watching it.  

most of the time, i could see the bottom of this object (the circular shape) but at times it would manuever and turn on its side and twirl around.  it stayed in one spot for a while, moved to the side, moved up, moved down, moved closer to me and then away from me, at times it appeared to be floating in one spot (not moving), and it also zig-zaged over to the side, twirl around and dart back towards the other side. it was the most unbelievable thing i have ever seen in my life.  a total rush!!  

after staring at it in amazement for a few minutes, it took me a few minutes to realize what it was.  it was the last thing i would ever imagine i would see.  it hit me like a ton of bricks that this was not something normal, and once i realized that, i thought "oh my goodness, i need to film this because i am the only one out here that sees this".  i kept staring at it thinking it would disappear, but it didn't, and it stayed in the same spot.  i was afraid to take my eyes off it and have it disappear, but after many minutes of it staying in the same area of the sky, i decided to chance running inside to document this moment.  so, i ran inside my house to grab a camera (which only took less than a minute) and when i came back outside, it was still in the same spot.  i filmed it with my camera and after a short time, the memory card filled up.  i had to run inside again to grab a spare memory card and when i came back outside, it was still there in the same spot.  

i called my roommate who was out with friends.  i was able to get ahold of her while i was filming and told her to go outside.  she was down the street from me and was able to see it as well, but from an angle that was not as good as mine.  i called my other friend and he told me to point a flash light up into the sky to attempt to get their attention.  he also told me to call the local police station to report it.  i ran inside to grab the flashlight. the batteries in my flashlight were almost dead, so the light on my flashlight was yellowish and not bright at all.  at the same time i turned on my flashlight and pointed it up into the sky, with my other hand, i called the hermosa beach police department's non-urgent phone number (my local police station) to report this sighting and right then, the ufo disappeared.  the woman on the phone told me she had already received another call minutes before from someone else in my area reporting the sighting.  

it was the craziest experience - i will never forget this experience and will always have that image in my mind.  the best part is that is stayed in the sky for longer than i could have ever imagined.

unfortunately the camera zoom was not good at all.  the image appeared small, as a white dot via my camera video but by my eyes, it was so much larger.  i extended my arm as far as i could up above me head to try to get the best video, but because the zoom wasn't good, i was watching it through my eyes because it was so much better, bigger, i could see sooo much more detail, and i could watch it move around in greater detail. its unfortunate that those images i saw didn't come through on my camera.  although if you can zoom, you might see more and be able to view what i was able to see.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc-shaped with bright lights around the edges. stayed visible for 20+ minutes & floated around in the same area of the sky the whole time.

content.detailedDescription: Started with 3 objects leaving trees/ then 2 sec. later tons of them
content.summary: Started with 3 objects leaving trees/ then 2 sec. later tons of them

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my friend when i saw a sliver shine in the air. and i told my friend and she just said it was the space station. but why would the space station be so clear? so i knew something was wrong, and we just watched the object untill it went behind the storm clouds.
content.summary: Long, slow moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the backyard with my young (2yrs) daughter and i looked up because i live near an airport and i always look up, and  noticed a very high object that was bright and kind of shined. it was a very clear day. it sat there for possibly 25 minutes, maybe longer. i needed to tend to my daughter so i couldn't watch forever. i took several photos and video. 
this thing was way too high to be a plane. i am located in oakland ca, near the airport and across the bay from san francisco airport. i see planes all day long and this wasn't a plane. it sat in one spot for a long time and then moved slowly to the south. again, way too high for plane and it sure wasn't a satellite. its not a balloon... too high, too large, and stayed still for a long period of time. and i have never seen a balloon that was this bright and big. from what i understand weather balloons would have something off the end/bottom. this thing was solid and round. 
this is the third time i have seen this object and the second time i have taken multiple photos. i took 12 photos this time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright circle in  clear sky moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on the patio with my girlfriend, the weather was nice with sunny skies and a few whispy clouds. i often watch the skies when i'm outside, hopeful to see something out of the ordinary. i just happened to lean back in my chair and look up. high in the sky at my 1 o'clock position there was what appeared to be a black crescent shaped object, heading south. at first i didn't think anything of it, i initially assumed it was a large hawk riding and gliding on high air thermals. i continued to watch it out of curiosity. i noticed that the movement was at a steady pace and there was no flapping of wings if it was a bird. i would estimate the height of the object to be about 30k, the same altitude as a lot of the jetliners that fly over. i listened for any noise from the object but didn't hear anything. i tried to get my girlfriend's attention and point out the object. just then a low flying cessna type aircraft came flying over and diverted my attention. when i looked again i couldn't see it anymore. i told her what i saw but was unable to locate it again. 

as she scanned the sky she saw the same type object at our 10 o'clock position, traveling the same direction and at the same height. we watched this one closely. it was crescent shaped and black, traveling straight and level with no noise. we both agreed it was not a typical airplane. i was in the air force for 10 years, i have seen many different types of aircraft. this object had no nose or tail section, it kind of reminded me of a flying wing, except the curve of the crescent was slight.  15 minutes later, two jetliners flew over at the same height and we could distinctly hear the faint roar of the engines.
content.summary: 2 crescent shaped black objects traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst walking back from a friends locally, i observed 2 orange lights moving north-eastwards over oxford.

these were followed by 3 other lights (also orange) in a straight line following the first two. 

the motion was steady and in an exact line.

my battery on my phone ran out (typical!) so i could not get any video evidence. this must have been seen by others as the local public houses were just emptying.

there was no sound whatsoever from the objects.

as an avid ufo watcher, i have not seen anything like this before (although i have seen a ufo about 15 years ago).

it seemed as if the objects were directly over oxford, as i was observing from kidlington (about 5 miles away).

feel free to e-mail me as i would really like to know more about this.
content.summary: Orange lights in sequence

content.detailedDescription: This report is being submitted by fi christine dickey for palmer miller.  the subject was driving home from work and saw three red blinking lights. he managed to get it on video, but only two of the lights are apparent and one is evident, but difficult to judge.  the object was above the telephone poles about 150 ft up hovering, but then went in the direction of tucson to the south. more detailed information needs to be gotten for the report.
content.summary: Subject was driving home and saw blinking lights hovering, then went in the direction of tucson to the south

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing the night sky using a canon g9 and sunpak 544 flash.  visible among the photos was the first object, taken about 8:52pm.  nine hours later i returned for another round of photos and captured the second object at 6:00am.  the photos enclosed have been cropped and enlarged with photoshop.  the original photos, plus many others, are available for expert analysis.
content.summary: Photos of elongated, multi-colored, illuminated objects

content.detailedDescription: About 1:30am i went out to check the sky. i had a sighting july 24th, and have been checking every night since. well, last night there were five dancing lights to the north of my house. actually pretty close to my house, and not straight up, but a little farther down. anyway, they were making a pattern. like they would come to the middle, and bounce off the center one, go back out, and turn 1/4 of the circle, and go back in to the middle one again. when they all met in the middle it would get a little brighter too. then they would bounce off and go back out again. it was awsome to watch. i wasn't afraid, just curious. i saw that someone reported the same thing at the same time, that must live north of me. they saw the event to the south, and i saw it to the north. i wish i could talk to this person. we have to live within a few miles of each other.
content.summary: Lights over light cloud cover forming a dancing pattern. springing out, and coming back in at the center

content.detailedDescription:
That light appeared again in the same spot, it just suddenly appears and then takes 10 minutes to go a short distance and goes behind mountain to the west.

tonight i went down lone mountain ave to rainbow blvd which is about 3 miles closer than i was last 3 nights to this object. it appeared for the fourth night in a row. it just suddenly appears out of nowhere. 1st picture shows object above mountains were it first appears suddenly���. aug 20, 21, 22 at 7:55, 7:53, 7:50 respectively and then tonight (aug23) at 7:45pm. the sighting always lasts around 10 minutes +- 1 minute and it always does the same thing. apears in a spot and slowly goes behind mountain in same spot. i am on the south west corner of lone mountain ave and rainbow looking west. i tried to use my 3x zoom but the power lines or something made my camera not focus so the pictures don���t do it justice but they will show exactly where it shows up in relation to the mountains. i did look with binoculars again and confirmed there were no strobe lights of any kind. it was a bright white disc shaped light.

  the second picture is a wide shot showing the whole mountain range west of north las vegas and the light descending down to the mountain, this picture will help any body interested know exactly were it was. i will not post on this object again unless it does something different since it could continue indefinatly���
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Punctual, bright white disc shaped light shows up right on schedual

content.detailedDescription:
I had been working at my computer and finished up at 1:03.  i went to
the kitchen to turn off the t.V.. and noticed the time as 1:05 a.M.  i
thought i would go outside to do a sky check.  when i stepped outside
i immediately saw 4 white lighted circles "dancing" about in a circular
pattern in the east/southeast portion of the sky almost, but not quite
directly above our house, but more above our neighbor's house to our
east.  the lights would each make about a 1/4 circle then move to the middle where they "hit" each other and bounced outward. i was very excited and went to wake my husband to come see the phenomenon.  when we went back outside, the circles of light continued in the same pattern as before. sometimes they would extend further out from each other, but always making a 1/4 circle sweep, then inward where they would "hit" and bounce away from each other.  this we viewed from our porch, and driveway, and road that runs in front of our house.  most of the time we viewed them from our driveway looking between a large maple tree in the front east yard and the front north of the house.  we observed the lights for 45 minutes.  the sky at this time was overcast and the lights seemed to be in or above the clouds. the lights were white (occasionally i noticed a faint yellowish cast to them).  the lights were circular and lit up the cloud as they moved about. . . only the circle of light was lit up, not the surrounding cloud.  the apparent size of each of the lights was about the  size of a full moon, perhaps a little larger. each of the lights appeared to be same size as the others.  the pattern remained the same throughout the event.  the lights did not seem to ascend or decend.  also, we noticed that when the sky had a clear patch, the light could not be seen when it passed into the cleared area of sky.  it was as if the cloud itself made it possible to see the lights.  the lights were east-southeast in the sky at the ceiling cloud level.  as the clouds dissipated, the lights were no longer visible.  i do not know if the lights were trying to communicate anything.  my thought was that perhaps they were trying to indicate a location to something else.  these were not strobe lights.  there was no sound, smell, or emission.  there were no other aircraft of any kind during the event. except for the sky being overcast, it was a warm quiet summer evening (early morning).The lights did not have any beam coming off them or extending downward.  the lights seemed to make a "glowing" circle in the cloud as they moved about.  the pattern seemed to indicate an intelligence about or something else was controlling them.  they did not seem threatening, however it was
a little unnerving to see something which clearly was not of this
world/dimension. we have a schnauzer dog and a cat, but they did not
show any indication of awareness of the event.
content.summary: Four white circular lights moving about in sky, meeting in center then bouncinig off and outward.

content.detailedDescription: I went to washington d.C. to the jr.Nylc and i took a picture and it came out.I also send a ufo picture.
content.summary: I took a picture and a rod came out.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to just take a look around. my dog was barking. she was facing the field across from my house. i looked around and  then noticed the ufo. it was "dancing". i moved left right up down in circles, in a looping j shaps. the lights kept flashing from red to white. it looked like a large star, slightly larger than any star in the sky, larger than jupitor appears. i was feeling quite happy watching this thing "dance" i the sky. at one point it seemed the object wss beginning to move closer to me. i became a bit frightened. it then retreated to its former distance. i watched it for five minutes. it was located low on the horizon, just above the tree tops behind the field. i then went in the house to see if my daughter was still awake so she could enjoy the sight. she was already in bed. i went back outside and looked to the southeast, the direction where i observed it. it was gone.  then i looked around the night sky and saw it or another similar object higher in the sky in the western sky. it was farther away, or perhaps was a smaller object.I watched it for approximately 5 minutes and then returned to my studio to paint. a bit later i went outside to look for it again but it was gone.
content.summary: It was a star like object, circle, alternated between red and white light

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio having a cigarette, when i noticed something in the sky. the "object" was very high up. i see a lot of planes in the area, this "object" was much much higher than what i am used to seeing. at first i thought it was a satellite, but realized that it was to bright of a sky to see any satellites( i know you can see them at dusk or at night, but not this time of day) it moved slowly across the sky. i went inside to get a pair of binoculars, when i came back it took me about 30 sec to find it again. it looked like it was spherical in shape and shiny metallic color. i watched it for about 7 to 8 mins before i lost it against the bright blue sky.
content.summary: The object (sphere) was high in the sky( a lot higher than normal aircraft around here that i've seen)

content.detailedDescription: I was taking survey pictures of the land around my house and this disc thing, though only for a few seconds was up and around my neighbors orchard. i took a pictue when it was about 600 yards in the air above an irrigation ditch. i thought was a bird diving down,then it went back up and around then down and it looked like a metal aloid like silicon. i felt almost hyptotized.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Pulsing like a heart beat through the air

content.detailedDescription:
I am actually a paranormal investigator who was on my way to do an investigation with 3 other team mates. i apologize for not having accurate dates, we didnt think to document the information. i know, of all people right?  all i can tell you is that it was around 11pm, and i was the driver of the vehicle. it was during the summer, about five years ago. we were about ten miles from where 281 and 290 west tbone. i happened to look up to my right, way far in the distance and saw blinking lights. it seemed small and i naturally thought it was a plane. the problem was, it was going diagonally toward the left,heading down, at a abnormal speed. at that point i looked at my partner and said, "is that plane crashing"? at this point all of us are staring at what we think is a plane about to take its last breath. just as it got about tree level, but about ten miles ahead of us, it abruptly stops in mid air and blows up into three enormous white lights. there was no having to explain to one another what we were staring at. so of course we have all this equipment so we are frantically looking for a shoulder to pull over. at this moment we hit a grove of trees. later we went back going the same speed and it took aproximately 3 seconds to pass the trees. within that three seconds, it somehow had totally vanished. we got no chance to take pics, video, anything. because of the distance away from us, all i can say was it was hovering around the 290/281 tbone up ahead of us. the interesting thing is, is if you take that right at 281 and keep going you run right smack into stephensville. of course this was a couple of years earlier, but it was a strange coincidence. all participants in this will tell the same story to a t. now, this is where it gets stranger, and as much as i feel crazy for even saying it, i feel i must tell you the whole story. first, this isnt the first ufo run in ive had, that was the second. the first was in the country outside of irving texas. just an fyi, because it seems alittle odd that twice i have seen something so incredible up close and personal. what are the chances, one in thousands, millions? anyway, a year and a half ago or so, ive decided to take my sister in law to fredericksburg texas where my father lives. now you have to realize, that i have been traveling back and forth from austin to fred for about 15 years. i instinctively know where i am at any given moment and can tell by my inner clock how long it will be till my next land mark. now, in order to get to fred from austin, you travel down 290 west going through dripping springs, then there is nothing till you get to the tbone of 281/290. im explaining to her as we drive through dripping this is where my uncle lives bla bla. so, from that point, you would go the exact same way as we were headed the night of the 2nd ufo sighting. from dripping springs the next town is johnson city. you drive all the way till the tbone at 281, take a right, and johnson city is about 7 miles or so. takes only moments to get there. right when i took a right on 281 my husband called and asked me if i was in fredericksburg yet, i replyed that we were almost in johnson city. from that point we were maybe 3 minutes from johnson, maybe alittle more but not much. three, four, five, ten minutes goes by and my internal clock started going off. something wasnt right. more and more i realized i had no idea where i was. i started really tripping out because after 15 years you pretty much would have to have had a total brain blooper to get lost in five minutes. so i look at nikki and tell her i have no idea where johnson city was, or where we were. im sure she was thinking i was pulling her chain at this point. she had never been to fredericksburg so all she knew was that we were supposed to hit some city called jc. at this point i have no idea of how long we were driving but it felt like about 20 minutes. in the distance i saw a yellow blinking light and a convenience store. about a minute after that i saw a sign that said fredericksburg one mile. my jaw dropped, i was speachless. thats about 45 miles in what seemed like about 15 to 20 minutes. now you have to understand, there is no other way to get to fredericksburg without going through jc, its impossible because you have to take a left in jc, drive 30 through downtown, and then on to fredericksburg. how could both of us have forgotten about driving through a town that only five minutes before i told my sister in law that we were fixing to hit jc. so we forgot in less than five minutes? a whole town filled with lights, stores still open, a flashing roadrunner sighn for a hotel you cant miss coming in to jc, you name it, and you cant miss it. by the time i got to my dads i was grabbing a road atlas and there was absolutely no other way to get to fredericksburg. i purposefully took her back through when we left at night. i knew if she had spaced the whole town seeing it again would jog her memory. she has no memory of going through jc, hye, or stonewall and neither do i. it wasnt until i drew a map of the location to show a friend that i stood speachless looking at the map realizing my "missed time"was in the same place as the ufo sighting a couple of years earlier. now i dont get rattled easily, i mean, im a paranormal researcher who thrives on the hopes of seeing a spirit up close and personal. this, has me totally freaked out. on top of that, i have had recurring nightmares of alien invasion for a few years now. in the dreams i never see them, but its always the same type of scenario. they show up in ships and take over yet i never see any fighting with our military and their ships. its just people running and hiding because they are completely defenseless. i dont want to tell too many people about this  because i always get that look. the your full of s*** look. i really feel like one of those paranoid weirdos spounting that they had been abducted with probes in the you know whats and so on. i actually would love a better idea than the one i came up with because if its the truth then something happened to me that no one is gonna believe even with the plethera of witnesses, 5 all together with all three times combined.  i know that four out of the five for sure will be more than happy to verify my story. unfortunately the first ufo i saw was with my boyfriend at the time and i was 19 and am now almost 37 so i wouldnt even know how to find him sadly. it scared me, honestly, and it gets more scary the more research i do. i would love some help on this and im sure you guys would love to do whatever you can to help. im a interesting case anyway, because this isnt the first thing that has happened to me that is quite amazing indeed. mostly dealing with the paranormal world. oh, by the way, i dont know if this means anything to you, so bare with me. it may mean nothing at all. when i was about maybe 5 or 6, my mother had me over at a friends house. i remember when she put me to bed, that it was a twin bed that sat up against a large window to the right of my head. i remember her tucking me in, then leaving. it seems it was in moments only after she left that i looked out the window and see this huge five pointed star right outside my window. i "think" it was a two story but i dont feel comfortable telling you something im notpositive of.  if you have ever seen a star saphire, it looked exactly like it only huge. i looked at it, thought nothing of it, and drifted off to sleep. all growing up i never thought it was a dream until i got way older and started to question myself. has there ever been a sighting of anything like that because i have no idea. its probably nothing, i try to be as skeptical as possible in these matters, but i just felt the sudden urge to add that story in as well. its alot of times easier to first reach me by email because i dont answer numbers i dont recognize but you can also leave a message and i will be happy to call you back. i truly hope im just crazy lol, i can handle ghosts, poltergeists, you name it ive been through it and been fine. but with all of the information i just gave you, im sure you can understand that im kinda freaked out. oh, just one more thing, im not trying to write a book, or get noticed because im already in a feild that gets alot of grief from skeptics. i have a good reputation in the community, have spoken at paranormal conferences, and am (as far as i know lol) considered to be extreemly even keeled and analytical about these things. i dont jump to conclusions or go half cocked making outrageous claims like some others in my feild have done in the past. so, trust me when i say i dont want to end up on the news sounding like a lunatic or write some stupid book most ppl will say is fraudulent anyway. so there it is, i am willing to do whatever to get to the bottom of it even if it turns out i really did drive through johnson city and somehow totally forgot right along with hye and stonewall. check it out on the map, you will see what i mean. thank you so much for hearing my story, i hope i didnt throw too much at you at once ;) katrina
ps~ i just thought of something. after we got to the location we were investigating after 3nd ufo incident, we also noticed an hour or so later of a meteor shower. we might be able to track the date if its even necessary. oh, and something else which might not be involved with it, but when you get to the road that turns left towards blanco which is where we were initially headed. that turn was only a couple of miles after the sighting. now we are in no mans land, closest town is blanco 10 miles away. this is all nothing but hill country. as i get to the road to turn i notice all these flashing red and blue lights from police and fire trucks. at least four or five cop cars, firetrucks ect. all parked just sitting there. it could have been something totally different, but i do know that it is likely that these officers saw this thing just like we did. maybe they thought it was a plane going down like we did at first. but when it blew up into three huge white lights it was just impossible due to the size of the thing. besides, what crashing plane can stop short and hover?   it came in so fast,without a heads up the blanco police  could have never gotten there that fast.    blanco is ten or so miles away. sorry i just want to tell you as much as i can remember so we can figure this thing out once and for all! oh and i wil give you all the numbers to contact the witnesses after i make sure its ok with them first which im sure it will be fine.
content.summary: Heading west on 290 towards johnson city, four in the car, thought it was plane crashing until it stopped in mid air and blew up into three enormous lights. it either turned its lights off or was completely gone within 3 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
yesterday morning (june 28, 2008), i was leaving for work at approximately 10:30am central time from my house in the heights near downtown houston, tx, when i leaned back to use my contact solution and i noticed a particularly strange formation in a cloud overhead. the cloud was approximately 300-350ft. wide and elongated in shape. nothing strange there, except for what caught my eye.

 i noticed a perfect dome of air being pressed up under
the cloud.  i've heard of this perfectly normal weather phenomenon before, but never had seen it so i inspected it more closely and noticed a perfectly round whole in the top of it which exposed something black behind it.  this still wasn't to out of place, but it was unusual to me, so i continued to stare.

 then what caught me eye next is something even more remarkable.  in the 
top upper left hand side of the cloud was a perfectly
shaped cube.  i say cube because it looked as if a cube had punched through it leaving a square on the bottom and a square on the top.  i could
see three sides of the cube in the middle and another parcial side which exposed blue sky.
 
 it looked as if something had gone from the ground up because there where 
tiny wisps of the cloud coming from the sides of the flat surfaces of the 
cube and they where caught in an upward draft.  this
is when i began to inspect it more closely and entirely. inside the cloud was a dark mass, but the mass was a perfect triangle!  i began to become excited.  i knocked on the door to show my mother whom i had just woken but she didn't answer, so i knocked on her bedroom window. later we realized that she was passing through the door to use the restroom and i had just missed her at both places.

 the cloud was drifting, so i had to crane my neck to see it and when i 
did, the tip exposed itself.  it was black in color and was a perfectly shaped triangle.  i tried to follow it but it passed over my neighbor's house and into the trees.  i did get to see it for about 10 seconds and since the cloud had a silver lining from the sun and it was a good distance ( approx. 30 -35 feet from the silver lining.) i definitely could tell it wasn't part of the cloud.

 since i no longer could see that, i turned my attention back to the cube, 
bbut it was beginning to break up.  so i focused on the dark shape inside 
the cloud.  that's when part of the cloud opened up and i saw the back of what was in the cloud! what i saw was the tail end of a craft of some sort. it was enormous!  
 
 i couldn't see the entire tail end of what was in the craft, but i did see multiple rows of rectangles not all the same in size and length, but 
perfect in shape laying horizontally.  they weren't all the same in color 
and size, but where all perfectly shaped.  they were earthy tones like 
copper, khaki, beige and light browns.

 after watching this for a moment as the cloud began to envelope the back 
end, a pod of 8 or 9 purple martins floated into the scene.  i've grown up 
with these birds and they weren't acting normal in nature.  they almost 
looked metallic in color.  i instantly felt the feeling as if something 
was trying to sway my attention.  the birds where riding a thermal, but none of them flapped their wings, which is unusual for
8 or 9 martins to not be doing.  my mother later pointed out that maybe
they where riding the thermal of this craft and/or what punched through
the cloud.  but i beg to differ, but do consider.

 i could no longer see the darkness in the cloud when returning my 
attention back to it.  "they succeeded," i told myself.  i finally 
returned my attention to the door and wanted to tell my mother of this 
experience.  she was very upset that see didn't get to see it, but if i turned my head away then it would have darted off.

 i got on the road and went to work.  on my way, i was looking at other 
clouds trying to find it or find something else. 
there where other dark masses in the clouds, but none like what i had just
witnessed and what a perfect way to cloak itself.

 i went to work twice yesterday.  once in the morning and again at 10:30pm
central time. because i was looking for it in the day, i was on my way to work and not coming home.  she tells it as if i where on my way home and not on the way to work.

 she and my grandmother both complained to me of having a terrible headache when i returned home from work around 4:30 pm.  but i can't get her to understand that how could i be looking for a cloud with sun on it and dark shapes in them if i'm at home and not driving? she remembers me telling her that i would tell grandmother about it over coffee on sunday morning (june, 29, 2008) because i wanted to take a nap before returning to work that evening.

 i thought i had it explained to her, but she refuses to believe me.  as i 
type this, she's telling me that i'm still wrong. interesting footnote, last night i dreamed of fibers being pulled from my head.  but i know i was looking for it in the day because i saw it during the day while it was day light and how i could look for a cloud with sun on it at 10:30pm?

 this was a most unusual experience and the fourth experience at witnessing something in the sky out of the ordinary and only 200 or 250 feet above me hanging at a low rate of speed hiding in a cloud and
with so many other unusual characteristics attributed to it and all without a sound.

i'm a believer, have been a believer and now i know why i'm a believer.  another guy i work with has been seeing objects over his house and i've been reading reports of objects being seen all over the houston area.  keep looking up folks.  they're up there!
content.summary: Triangle spotted over houston, tx

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch, smoking a cig. from the south a solid black oject was coming under the  clouds it was shaped like three black eggs or footballs bunched together forming a triangle..About as high as a small plane... it flew  right over my place and when it passed my roof i ran inside looking for my camrea or binoclulars about thirty seconds later i ran to my front of the house and watched the object slowly fly over the austin downtown area....I notice other small planes in the same skyline and the sun reflected on them   this object moved like a plane, you know in a straight line and seemed to follow the 35 hwy that runs thru town.. i watch the skys often this was somthing that honestly looked manmade.. im just wondering if anyone saw or knows if the city has some unmanned servalence equip.
content.summary: Three solid black eggs together forming a triangle with small white spot in center

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the road when out of the corner of my eye i saw 2 very bright lights in the sky not too high above the water of the pond. i pulled over to view and got out of my car after seeing that they did not disappear right away. one of them either flew away very quickly or disappeared while the other came closer to me it appeared to be a rainbow of very bright lights around a disk. it blinded me as if i stared into headlights then by the time i regained my sight it had vanished. i had observed it for about 5 minutes before it left. the next night i returned with my friend and a high quality video camera and again at exactly 10:00 it returned this time by its self. this time it was a little farther from the shore. the object zig zagged right, left up and down very quickly changing directions. my camera was set to night vision on a tripod with a slower shutter speed. i captured it both in night vision and in normal capture mode. the camera with its slow shutter was unable to capture its very fast jerky style movement that was visible by the naked eye but some was seen on tape. it disappeared only to reappear in the same spot about 15 minutes later. each time it would stay for about 5-8 minutes. it would hover in the same exact area each time.  at least once it appeared to shoot a quick  beam of light almost appearing like lighting in sky and light up the ground around it. i have seen this object in the large field in back of my house ( miles away from the pond) for the past couple weeks now. at the pond down the road is where the closest sightings happened on 2 occasions. you can tell its not a normal airplane. there is no noise, the light is very intense and it changes direction at a very fast rate. there is no blinking lights like you see on the wings of an airplane. there also appeared to be at least one or two smaller craft that came out of the larger one and after exiting they flew in opposite directions of each other. we also have audio that appears to sound like some other creature speaking but we are not sure it could be some animal. we herd the voices and captured it on video after the ship had passed over us. i have very good video of the incident however the camera did not capture the rainbow light but instead captured a very bright whitish\blueish color. 

the reason i am reporting it to you is i did a google search and found your ct mutual ufo network just now and the picture of the rainbow lights that was also taken in ct. it is the same ship that we saw!! i have a feeling this ufo can be further captured at around the same time if you wish to visit the area soon with higher quality video equipment. i live in the country, i am a 26 year old male. my friend was also witness with me on the second night when we came prepared with a camera. the object appears over a pond and the light is close enough to reflect off the water. it hovers between the pond and a large set of woods. please let me know if you can help to capture this object as it is seem all the time in the hours between 9 and 11:30. sometimes there are a couple of them and they appear about 20 feet apart. i am going to try and upload some of the video soon.

porterzcustomz@comcast.Net
content.summary: I was driving down the road when i saw 2 very bright lights over a pond

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch, smoking a cig. from the south a solid black oject was coming under the  clouds it was shaped like three black eggs or footballs bunched together forming a triangle..About as high as a small plane... it flew  right over my place and when it passed my roof i ran inside looking for my camrea or binoclulars about thirty seconds later i ran to my front of the house and watched the object slowly fly over the austin downtown area....I notice other small planes in the same skyline and the sun reflected on them   this object moved like a plane, you know in a straight line and seemed to follow the 35 hwy that runs thru town.. i watch the skys often this was somthing that honestly looked manmade.. im just wondering if anyone saw or knows if the city has some unmanned servalence equip.
content.summary: Three solid black eggs together forming a triangle with small white spot in center

content.detailedDescription:
I was cooking rice for sushi. i suddenly, as i leaned forward, felt a sharp pain in my stomach. i thought i must have burnt myself but the top wasn't on fire or damaged, just my stomach, so i decided to finish the rice. it was strange though that it was already finished (it takes about an hour for me to cook because i'm fussy) and starchy water had spilt out onto the stovetop.

later when i looked carefully, worried i'd damaged my top, i found that there was a scar in the dead centre of my stomach. not an open cut, not a burn, but a scar.  about three centremetres from my navel.
-half an inch long.
-5 millimetres wide.
-irratated skin around edges
-tender.

it was strange but i didn't really know what to do about it or what it'd be. my work clothes hadn't been burnt and as strange as it seems, that was what bothered me more at the time. but there was no blood, nothing sharp around the stove. i continued to cook with the rice and didn't think on it further, it was dark and i didn't want to think about anything scaryish.

it's been almost a week later and it hasn't changed. it hasn't healed, or got worse, and i realized that there was something odd about it. it resembled my surgical scars from old keyhole surgery, after the surgery, and the stomach above the cut was really itchy, like that 'healing itch' itchy that wounds get. it is still like that. wound is still pink around edges, whiteish in centre, shrunk a bit but still exactly the same as before. 
i have a lapband around my uppar stomach. (hense the keyhole surgery scars.) a few days ago the stomach swelled very badly, very very badly, and there was an area to the left of the stomach that really badly hurt to the point of being unable to sleep. i was tempted to wake my room mate to take me to the hospital, i was pacing up and down outside her room concidering it at 2am, but for some reason i changed my mind and went to bed. 

i'm sorry, i can't get good photos. but it's the second weird scar i've gotten.

the other weird wound was about an inch and a half below the bellybutton, to the right. it was a perfect circle, raised up (like a donut) on the edges and a perfect dent/circle wound in the middle. i seriously mean a perfect circle, i checked it. still trying to heal. it happened about two weeks ago. i noticed it during the day. 

i have photos of both but i need to get them off my phone. 





not first weird events. i had a possible abduction when i was four, other possible abductions between 5 and 10, one during a school camp when i was 13.
content.summary: Strange cut on stomach, another below bellybutton,  lost time?

content.detailedDescription:
bright disc shaped light showed up again right on schedule 7:50 pm aug 22. i posted yesterday that this same weird light keeps appearing in the same spot at the same time. i told everyone in north vegas to look west over the mountains between 7:50 and 7:58pm. well 7:50 rolls around and the object appears. 

                  i was on lone mountain ave near simmons ave, looking west. i had my binoculars and sony cybershot 7.2 mega pixel camera ready in case it showed up for the third night in a row, it did.   in the exact same spot a bright light suddenly appears like a very bright star (no stars are out yet) it was two finger widths (held at arm length) above the mountain tops (see 1st picture). it then hovered and descended very very slowly. it seemed to not move in a perfectly straight way. it went almost straight down, but moved slightly left and right,  slightly favoring the right as it went down. it took 5 minutes to go one finger width down towards the mountain (no plane fly���s that slow). it took another five minutes to go the other finger width and disappear behind the mountain. i looked with my binoculars and it looked definitely disc shaped and bright shiny white like a very, very bright star. it had no strobe light and i looked at it for the whole ten minutes, except for the time i took to take some photos.

                   my camera is not designed for this kind of shooting, i turned the flash off, (iso mode), and tried to keep the bright nearby lights out of the frame and took three shots. it shows up good in one , bad in another and not at all in the third. the photo were you can see the object pretty good (1stphoto) you cant see the mountains very good, so i also attached the not so good one because you can see the mountains better and you can still see the object (although its fuzzy and hard to see). i know it won���t convince a skeptic but it will at least show where it was in relation to the mountain. it looks kind of like a star with a tail, i did not see the tail, it only showed in the picture. this picture was taken within the first minute of it appearing. my binoculars are (16x32) and i had to steady them on a wall but i could see it very well and am sure it���s not an airplane or helicopter.

                    it has showed up in the same place 3 nights in a row. aug 20, 21, 22 at 7:55, 7:53, 7:50pm respectively. if it follows the obvious pattern it will show up tomorrow (aug 23) at 7:47pm. please if anyone in the vegas area reads this go look at it. anywhere in north las vegas that can see the mountains to the west could see it very easily. use binoculars for the full effect and if you see what i���m talking about post your sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white, disc shaped object appeared again third night in a row. same place, same time.

content.detailedDescription: I was working the night shift and took a quick break outside to watch the sunrise which was particularly nice. the sun was just below the horizon. i was scanning the sky for venus but could not find it. then, i spotted a bright light in the sky alomost directly overhead. i thought that it was venus at first, but then the object began to dart around in  short bursts. it changed direction several times and moved extremely fast. it appeared to be very high in the sky. then, it just seemed to fade away. it moved in a way that reminded me of when i would shine a flashlight on the wall to tease my cat.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Zig-zagging star

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside and saw a super bright object in the sky. it was not moving, and pretty far away.

the video was taken with a canon l2 pro camcorder (hi-8) with a 15 x zoom lens.

i don't know what it was. it seemed to glow with every color in the rainbow. pause the screen, and you will know what i am talking about. i recently got this camera, so i am not good with it yet. (lots of buttons, etc).

it disappeared as the sun was coming up. so i think it was a star. although there were several stars in the horizon, this one was something that gave off a great amount of brilliance.

can someone tell me what it may be?

thanks
content.summary: Multi-colored ufo or star?

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend where riding our bikes and this rocet like shooting star
went slow and then shot up in the sky and so we went to go see what it was
and when we got to the beach we see no one and we look up and this disc
is going about 25mph and had four lights on each side and had a green glow
and a sound like rum rrrrrum rum rum rrrrrummmm and we road home as fast
as we can it happend in the bay of st.Louis in bay st.Louis ms 
by breeden place we were freeked out and when it pased it sort of puled
allthe gravity away and we felt liter.We thought it was afire work at first
content.summary: It had 4 lights 1 on each side rownd green glow and something shot up to it!!!

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was visiting me in portland a few weeks ago from germany and he was taking some video of downtown portland while sightseeing in the aerial tram.  about a week later he was watching the footage after uploading it on his computer and he noticed something hovering over the city like a helicopter but then take off at a speed and angle that we don't think could possibly be a helicopter or plane.  we have no idea what it was or even if perhaps it was a reflection or something but it sure looks like something that was flying over the city.  anyway i've never done anything like this but figured i would look around online and now i'm interested in seeing what an expert might think.  the incident happened on august 6th at around noon and like i said he was in the portland aerial tram looking down over downtown. as for witnesses there were others in the tram but no one saw anything or had any reaction at the time.  if you listen to the video you can kind of hear a kid reacting to something but who knows if it is related. it was a cloudy day as well. we posted the video to youtube to see if anyone else saw anything that day so the link is below so you can see the footage. i will attach the video to this as well. curious what your thoughts are!

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=adjogvtd2um

thanks
content.summary: Something seems to be hovering over downtown and then takes off over the city
